stories.text:
BrightHire | Fully Remote | Full-time | https://brighthire.ai/careers/ BrightHire’s mission is to fix hiring, making it fundamentally more equitable, effective, collaborative, and human.

We’re doing this by building the first intelligent platform for the most important part of the hiring process: interviews and decisions. We just closed a $12.5m Series A from Index Ventures — and the investors behind Figma, Slack, Notion and Roblox to make hiring better and more equitable.

* Head of Data Science https://jobs.lever.co/brighthire/c3ad3bfc-e3b4-4aca-a3ad-be1a6a05fb09?lever-origin=applied&lever-source%5B%5D=Hacker%20News * Senior Machine Learning Engineer https://jobs.lever.co/brighthire/5ef51206-0105-4788-af98-9d45816523c8?lever-origin=applied&lever-source%5B%5D=Hacker%20News * Staff/Principal Full Stack Engineer https://jobs.lever.co/brighthire/7fbb7fb9-ae91-4841-a55d-b5b650f36cf3?lever-origin=applied&lever-source%5B%5D=Hacker%20News * Senior Full Stack Engineer https://jobs.lever.co/brighthire/43eee1e7-42a8-4cbd-9aa6-81448b7d0976?lever-origin=applied&lever-source%5B%5D=Hacker%20News
